name: Dice Dungeon (derHinek)
description:
My submission for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Controls
WASD or arrow keys --> move/roll die (hold key longer to roll further)
Mouse & left button --> shoot (costs 5 magic per shot)

You play as a die and can move by rolling yourself. Numbers facing up give you additional mana. You can use magic missiles (cost 5 mana) to attack enemies. Some enemies will cast spells on you, these curses harm you, when the cursed side of you faces up. Some power ups give you bonuses, the bonuses will benefit you, when the right side of you faces up.

HUD
Health
Magic (roll die to gain more magic)
Bonuses/curses (get activated, when right face is up)

Bonuses
Shield --> you only take half the damage, as long as this face is up
Sword --> you deal double the damage, as long as this face is up

Curses
Skull --> you take 3 damage, when this face comes up
Fire --> you take 1 damage per second, as long as this face is up

Known Bugs

  • HUD, Title and GameOver on fullscreen --> Did forget to set the aspect, etc. to allow fullscreen, before submitting.
  • Bonuses sometimes stay active, although they already depleted or wrong face is showing up --> Somehow messed this up in the last minute release.
